name: extester-runner
description: Extension for vscode-extension-tester which allow users to run, debug, list tests directly inside VS Code.

colors.description: The color used for the 'only' modifier.
The color used for the 'skip' modifier.

extesterRunner.testFileGlob.markdownDescription: Glob pattern to locate test files in the workspace. Default: `**/ui-test/**/*.test.ts`.

extesterRunner.excludeGlob.markdownDescription: Glob pattern to exclude specific paths from test file search. Default: `**/node_modules/**`.

extesterRunner.ignorePathPart.markdownDescription: Pattern to hide specific segments of folder paths in the test view. Matching parts will be removed from displayed paths.

extesterRunner.tsconfig.markdownDescription: Specifies the TypeScript configuration file used for compilation. Default: `tsconfig.json`. This setting is used to determine `outDir` and `rootDir` from the TypeScript project configuration.

extesterRunner.outFolder.markdownDescription: Defines the output directory (`outDir`) where compiled JavaScript files are stored after TypeScript transpilation. If not explicitly set, the value is derived from `tsconfig.json` (if available). If `outDir` is undefined in both, `out` is used.

extesterRunner.rootFolder.markdownDescription: Specifies the root directory (`rootDir`) of the TypeScript source files. If not explicitly set, the value is derived from `tsconfig.json` (if available). If `rootDir` is undefined, TypeScript infers it automatically.

extesterRunner.visualStudioCodeVersion.markdownDescription: Specifies the VS Code version. Options: `max`, `min`, `latest`, or a specific version (e.g., `1.97.1`). Default: `max` (max version supported by ExTester). This setting overrides any corresponding [environment variables](https://code.visualstudio.com/docs/reference/variables-reference#_environment-variables).

extesterRunner.visualStudioCodeType.markdownDescription: Defines the VS Code distribution. Use `stable` (default) for the official, fully tested release with monthly updates, or `insider` for a preview version with daily updates and experimental features (potentially unstable). See [VS Code Insiders page](https://code.visualstudio.com/insiders/) for more info. This setting overrides any corresponding [environment variables](https://code.visualstudio.com/docs/reference/variables-reference#_environment-variables).

extesterRunner.additionalArgs.markdownDescription:
Additional arguments for the ExTester `setup-and-run` command.

See [ExTester wiki](https://github.com/redhat-developer/vscode-extension-tester/wiki/Test-Setup#set-up-and-run-tests) for more details.

commands.title: Run Folder
commands.tooltip: Run all test files inside folder.

scripts.compile: npm run check-types && npm run lint && node esbuild.js
scripts.package: npm run check-types && npm run lint && node esbuild.js --production
scripts.pretest: npm run compile-tests && npm run compile && npm run lint
